org.reservation.module.service

Class ReservationDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.reservation.module.service.ReservationDAO

  • public class ReservationDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    ReservationDAO is used for making reservation and for cancelling reservation

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReservationDAO()
      Connection with database must be established.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double calculateCharges(java.lang.String regNo, java.sql.Timestamp pick, java.sql.Timestamp drop)
      The calculateCharges() operation calculates the estimated reservation charges
      int cancelReservation(java.lang.String confirmationNo, java.lang.String phoneNumber, java.sql.Timestamp picktime)
      The cancelReservation() operation assumes that confirmation number shouldn't be empty.
      ReservationListModel displayReservations() 
      java.lang.String getCategory(java.lang.String regNo)
      This getCategory() operation takes the vehicle registration number and returns its category
      java.lang.String getConfirmationNo(java.lang.String regNo)
      This getConfirmationNo() operation takes the registration number and returns its confirmationNo
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      boolean makeReservation(int uid, java.sql.Timestamp pickDate, java.sql.Timestamp dropDate, java.lang.String regNo, java.lang.String[] addEquip)
      This makeReservation() updates reservation, makeReservation and RequireAdditionalEquip table in the superrent database where the reservation table contains reservation related information, makeReservation contains reserved vehicle and reservation relationship information and RequireAdditionalEquip contains the booked equipments along with reservation.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • cancelReservation

        public int cancelReservation(java.lang.String confirmationNo,
                    java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                    java.sql.Timestamp picktime)
                      throws java.text.ParseException,
                             java.sql.SQLException
        The cancelReservation() operation assumes that confirmation number shouldn't be empty. It updates the Reservation and makeReservation table in superrent database.
        Parameters:
        confirmationNo -
        phoneNumber -
        picktime -
        Returns:
        0 on error, else positive value
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException
        java.sql.SQLException

        This makeReservation() updates reservation, makeReservation and RequireAdditionalEquip table in the superrent database where the reservation table contains reservation related information, makeReservation contains reserved vehicle and reservation relationship information and RequireAdditionalEquip contains the booked equipments along with reservation.

        pickDate -
